writer¶

writer.py¶

Functions for writing model outputs.

writer.SpinUpdate(self, mtime)¶

Overwrite the variables in the spin file to whatever they are at time = mtime

Parameters

mtime (float) – Time (model time) at which the

writer.write_nospin_hdf5(self, Mout_dict)¶

Write the results fromt the main model run to hdf file.

Parameters

Mout_dict (dict) – contains all of the model outputs; each key is the name of the output

writer.write_spin_hdf5(self)¶

Write the model outputs to hdf file at the end of spin up.
